data.content:
The aesthetics of the UI need major improvement, to make the app appear less vibe coded, more modern, and more minimalist.

I want all emojis removed, I want colours to be less bolder and with fewer gradients. I want UI elements to have subtle little quality signs.

Any questions?

data.content:
Clean build with zero warnings. All 15 tasks complete. Here's the summary:

**Files changed (13):**

| File | Key changes |
|------|-------------|
| [src/index.css](src/index.css) | New cool-slate palette, Inter font, refined animations, thinner scrollbar, focus rings |
| [src/context/ThemeContext.tsx](src/context/ThemeContext.tsx) | Default theme → slate (`#0f172a` bg, `#64748b` accent) |
| [src/pages/Landing.tsx](src/pages/Landing.tsx) | 6 emojis removed, gradient title → flat white, flat slate buttons |
| [src/pages/HostCreate.tsx](src/pages/HostCreate.tsx) | 8 emojis + preset emoji rendering removed, 4 gradients → flat |
| [src/pages/HostSession.tsx](src/pages/HostSession.tsx) | 22 emojis removed, podium/timer/alerts all muted |
| [src/pages/PlayerSession.tsx](src/pages/PlayerSession.tsx) | All emojis removed, option colors → flat `bg-*/900/40`, podium muted |
| [src/pages/PlayerJoin.tsx](src/pages/PlayerJoin.tsx) | Gradient button → flat slate, softened borders & focus states |
| [src/pages/SoloPlay.tsx](src/pages/SoloPlay.tsx) | 25+ emojis removed, grade system → text-only, all gradients → flat |
| [src/pages/AudienceJoin.tsx](src/pages/AudienceJoin.tsx) | 2 emojis removed, gradient → flat, softer inputs |
| [src/pages/AudienceSession.tsx](src/pages/AudienceSession.tsx) | 11 emojis removed, spinner → CSS, bars/podium/alerts muted |
| [src/pages/Settings.tsx](src/pages/Settings.tsx) | Cards rounded-xl, dev mode yellow → muted amber |
| [src/components/GlobalNav.tsx](src/components/GlobalNav.tsx) | 🏠 → SVG hamburger icon, softer shadows & borders |

**Design system applied globally:**
- `rounded-2xl` → `rounded-xl`, `shadow-lg` → `shadow-sm`
- `font-black` → `font-bold`, `font-bold` → `font-semibold` on buttons
- `active:scale-[0.98]` micro-interaction on buttons
- `border-white/10`–`/15` thin borders instead of bold outlines
- All bright accent colors (purple, indigo, yellow, green) muted to `/40`–`/60` opacity variants
